Sentencas: This work studies the ionic conductivity of nanosized Gd-, Sm-, and Y-doped ceria prepared by the infiltration/impregnation method.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of infiltrated Ln (Ln = Gd, Sm, Y)-doped ceria

Sentencas: The nanoparticles were deposited onto porous pure ceria substrates via infiltration-heating processes, and the conductivity was determined with the electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) using the conductive model for infiltrated phases.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of infiltrated Ln (Ln = Gd, Sm, Y)-doped ceria

Sentencas: The conductivity of the infiltrated doped ceria changes with the doping amount, and Gd0.25Ce0.75O2-delta , Sm0.2Ce0.8O2-delta , and Y0.15Ce0.85O2-delta show the highest values of 2.56, 3.01, and 2.07 x 10(-3) S center dot cm(-1) at 600 A degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of infiltrated Ln (Ln = Gd, Sm, Y)-doped ceria

Sentencas: Overall, Sm-doped samples show the highest conductivity, while Y-doped samples show the lowest conductivity.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of infiltrated Ln (Ln = Gd, Sm, Y)-doped ceria

Sentencas: In consideration of the Bruggeman factor, the intrinsic conductivity of the infiltrated doped ceria was calculated.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of infiltrated Ln (Ln = Gd, Sm, Y)-doped ceria

Sentencas: Compared with the bulk doped ceria, the intrinsic conductivity is higher while the activation energy is lower, which may suggest different conduction mechanisms.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of infiltrated Ln (Ln = Gd, Sm, Y)-doped ceria

Sentencas: Besides, co-doping effects on the conductivity of the infiltrated sample are less obvious than those of the bulk sample.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of infiltrated Ln (Ln = Gd, Sm, Y)-doped ceria
